item.title: Automating my Kitchen Rangehood Fan and Light
item.description: I originally posted this write-up on the Home Assistant Community Forums. I thought I would post it here as well, since I haven’t written anything on this blog for a while. I’ve been getting more serious about Home Automation lately, so I might start writing some more blog posts and making a few videos. I figured out how to control the light and fan in the rangehood above my stove.
